title: The Digital India Act, 2025
description: A comprehensive framework for data protection, intermediary liability, and regulation of emerging technologies.

title: The Corporate Governance and ESG Disclosure Bill, 2025
description: A bill to enforce stricter corporate governance norms and mandatory Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) reporting.

title: The National Green Energy Framework, 2025
description: Policy outlining subsidies, carbon taxes, and infrastructure development for renewable energy.
